attributes.action: stop private dentists practising  in britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: because some people pay and some dont dentist get more from paying people and neglect nhs patients if evryone was nhs there wouldnt be this problem of dentist not seeing people who are nhs. the dentists are being greedy and are destroying the nhs dental system i belive somthing must be done before there are no nhs dentists,the dentists are biting the hand that has traind and fed them  because there being greedy and charging more then there work is worth and people pay if this carries on it will be the end of free dental care for evryone
